Html:
Hi,

I want to know if it's possible with ProtPaladin to use hit cap and expertise cap to optimise his gear ?

I'm sorry if my english is bad, because i'm french :)
If you don't understand i will explain you again after.

Thank
I believe there are optimization parameters you can specify for chance to miss, which you'd want to set to <0. If not, can we get those added, Neg/Sol?
% Hit Chance,  Spell Hit Chance, % Chance to be Avoided, should  all be at the bottom of the optimizable list, since rev. 33214 so it should be in the current release.
Ok I found it ! Thank you :)
